  • Park Cameras Ambassador

Park Cameras Ambassador

Andy Rouse

BIOGRAPHY

Andy Rouse is a professional Wildlife and Aviation photographer with nearly two decades of imaging experience to call upon. Rouse has been a Park Cameras Ambassador since early 2016 and attends our annual Imaging Festival where he offers his pro advice and talks about his experiences – of which there are many and varied.

Rouse has a deep love for wildlife that inspires him to photograph some of the world’s most endangered and protected creatures. This led him to become an ambassador for 21st Century Tiger to support the efforts to protect wild tigers. Rouse also donates to charity through his aviation photography, supporting charities including Aerobility.

With a kit bag that most of us can only dream of and an enviously large and diverse image library to his name, Andy Rouse is a professional in name and nature and is a true ambassador not only for Park Cameras but for the photographic industry as a whole

SHOWCASE

Andy Rouse

GEAR

Andy Rouse is not only a Park Cameras Ambassador, he’s also a Canon Explorer – an acknowledgment that he is a nationally renowned photographer, specialising in Wildlife and Aviation photography.

With a kit bag that makes him the envy of most colleagues, Rouse uses the latest Canon gear and often reviews new equipment for us.

Here you’ll find the gear that Rouse uses for all his photography and videography.

START A FOTOBUZZ MEMBERSHIP TODAY

What is FotoBuzz? It's an exclusive photography community hidden behind closed doors so members can enjoy expert articles, talk among themselves, ask for advice, upload images for critique and take part in competitions, all in a 100% safe environment. Membership is open to anyone who wants to learn about photography and have fun doing it!

Andy Rouse & Andrew James
